entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
